}

description: Voir les informations d'un ennemi.
name: Scan
note:
<Before Eval>
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);

  var text = target.name() + '\n';
  text += '\\px[30]\\c[4]PV:\\c[0] ' + target.hp;
  text += '/' + target.mhp;
  text += '\\px[230]\\c[4]PM:\\c[0] ' + target.mp;
  text += '/' + target.mmp;
  text += '\\px[430]\\c[4]PT:\\c[0] ' + target.tp;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[30]\\c[4]FOR:\\c[0] ' + target.atk;
  text += '\\px[230]\\c[4]INT:\\c[0] ' + target.mat;
  text += '\\px[430]\\c[4]AGI:\\c[0] ' + target.agi;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[30]\\c[4]END:\\c[0] ' + target.def;
  text += '\\px[230]\\c[4]VOL:\\c[0] ' + target.mdf;
  text += '\\px[430]\\c[4]CHA:\\c[0] ' + target.luk;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
 
  var weakness = '';
  var resist = '';
  var immune = '';
  var absorb = '';
  var elements = $dataSystem.elements;
  for (var i = 1; i < elements.length; ++i) {
    var name = elements[i];
    var rate = target.elementRate(i);
    if (rate > 1) {
      weakness += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 0) {
      absorb += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate === 0) {
      immune += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 1) {
      resist += name + ' ';
    }
  }
  if (weakness === '') weakness = 'Aucune';
  if (resist === '') resist = 'Aucune';
  if (immune === '') immune = 'Aucune';
  if (absorb === '') absorb = 'Aucune';
  weakness = '\\c[4]Faiblesse:\\c[0] ' + weakness + '\n';
  resist = '\\c[4]Résistance:\\c[0] ' + resist + '\n';
  immune = '\\c[4]Immunité:\\c[0] ' + immune + '\n';
  absorb = '\\c[4]Absorption:\\c[0] ' + absorb;
  text = weakness + resist + immune + absorb;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
}
</Before Eval>

description:
Le lanceur sacrifie un allié pour lancer une attaque
dont les dégâts dépendents de l'allié sacrifié.
name: Échange Morbide
note:
<Custom Requirement>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Check to see if there are more than 1 allied members (user + ally).
value = allies.length > 1;
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Cost Display>
\i[1]Allié
</Custom Cost Display>

<Custom Execution>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Remove the user from the group.
allies.splice(allies.indexOf(user), 1);
// Pick a random ally.
var ally = allies[Math.floor(Math.random() * allies.length)];
// Store the ally's current HP value with the user.
user._allyHp = ally.hp;
// Store the ally's current MAT value with the user.
user._allyMat = ally.mat;
// Play animation 65 on the ally.
ally.startAnimation(65);
// Time to kill off the ally.
ally.gainHp(-1 * ally.hp);
// Perform the collapse effect on the ally.
ally.performCollapse();
</Custom Execution>

<Damage Formula>
// Damage Formula used for the skill.
value = user._allyHp + user._allyMat * 14;
// Remove stored ally HP value.
user._allyHp = undefined;
// Remove stored ally MAT value.
user._allyMat = undefined;
</Damage Formula>

description:
Le lanceur sacrifie un allié pour lancer une attaque
dont les dégâts dépendent de l'allié sacrifié.
name: Échange Morbide II
note:
<Custom Requirement>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Check to see if there are more than 1 allied members (user + ally).
value = allies.length > 1;
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Cost Display>
\i[1]Allié
</Custom Cost Display>

<Custom Execution>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Remove the user from the group.
allies.splice(allies.indexOf(user), 1);
// Pick a random ally.
var ally = allies[Math.floor(Math.random() * allies.length)];
// Store the ally's current HP value with the user.
user._allyHp = ally.hp;
// Store the ally's current MAT value with the user.
user._allyMat = ally.mat;
// Play animation 65 on the ally.
ally.startAnimation(65);
// Time to kill off the ally.
ally.gainHp(-1 * ally.hp);
// Perform the collapse effect on the ally.
ally.performCollapse();
</Custom Execution>

<Damage Formula>
// Damage Formula used for the skill.
value = user._allyHp * 2 + user._allyMat * 20;
// Remove stored ally HP value.
user._allyHp = undefined;
// Remove stored ally MAT value.
user._allyMat = undefined;
</Damage Formula>

description:
Diminue vos soins mais augmente vos attaques magiques.
Activable et désactivable à volonté.
name: Attitude du Croisé
note:
<Before Eval>
// The State ID of the Cleric Stance.
var clericStanceId = 37;
// Check if the user is affected by the state.
if (user.isStateAffected(clericStanceId)) {
  // If the user is, then remove the state.
  user.removeState(clericStanceId);
// If the user isn't...
} else {
  // Then add the state.
  user.addState(clericStanceId);
}
</Before Eval>

  // If the user is, then remove the state.

description:
Attaque un ennemi tout en soignant vos alliés. Masse
ou fléau. (FOR)
name: Charge Inspirante
note:
<Custom Execution>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Remove the user from the group.
allies.splice(allies.indexOf(user), 1);
var ally = allies[0];
ally.gainHp(Math.floor(500 + (0.6 * user.mat) + (ally.hp / 9.0)));
ally.startAnimation(41);
var ally = allies[1];
ally.gainHp(Math.floor(500 + (0.6 * user.mat) + (ally.hp / 9.0)));
ally.startAnimation(41);
var ally = allies[2];
ally.gainHp(Math.floor(500 + (0.6 * user.mat) + (ally.hp / 9.0)));
ally.startAnimation(41);
</Custom Execution>

description: Attaque 2 adversaires aléatoire 5 fois. (FOR + AGI)
name: Décattaque
note:
<Post-Damage Eval>
if (target.isActor() && target._classId === 6) {
  if (!target.isLearnedSkill(item.id)) {
    target.learnSkill(item.id);
    var text = target.name() + ' a appris '
    text = text + item.name + '!';
    $gameMessage.add(text);
  }
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

description:
Une attaque mortelle réservée aux utilisateurs d'armes
à feu. Faible coût mais risque de corruption. (AGI)
name: Tir Risqué
note:
<Custom Execution>

var nb = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10);
if(nb > 8){
	user.addState(39);
}
</Custom Execution>

description:
Une attaque entièrement basé sur la chance de 
l'utilisateur et celle de l'adveraire. (LUK)
name: Attaque chanceuse
note:
<Post-Damage Eval>
if (target.isActor() && target._classId === 6) {
  if (!target.isLearnedSkill(item.id)) {
    target.learnSkill(item.id);
    var text = target.name() + ' a appris '
    text = text + item.name + '!';
    $gameMessage.add(text);
  }
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

description:
Attaque qui a une chance sur deux de soigner 
et une sur deux d'être doublée. (LUK)
name: Pari
note:
<damage formula>

var nb = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10);
if(nb > 5 ){
	target.gainHp(((a.luk * 32.0) + (a.luk / b.luk) * a.luk * a.luk * 0.6) / (b.luk * 0.7));
}
else{
	value = ((a.luk * 32.0) + (a.luk / b.luk) * a.luk * a.luk * 0.6) / (b.luk * 0.7);
            value *= 2 ;
}
</damage formula>

description: Une attaque qui vous rendra riche ! (FOR)
name: Cupidité
note:
<Custom Execution>
$gameParty.gainGold(100);
</Custom Execution>
